title: Google confirms Pixel bug that randomly changes your ringtone and alarm sounds [Update]
content:
A curious bug impacting some Pixel owners sees the Phone ringtone, Default notification sound, and Default alarm sounds randomly change on Google devices.

description: A curious bug impacting some Pixel owners results in the Phone ringtone and Default notification sound randomly changing on Google devices...
